description: Rie`s stepfather. He was upset at Jyuuzou for abandoning the Kifuuken succession for a Shokujinki woman. He used the Kemonozume technique to prove that he`s stronger than Jyuuzou which ended in a bloody disaster. He survived but became a crazy bitter old man locked away in Ooba`s building. After Toshihiko talked to him, he took what`s left of his Kifuuken honour and stopped Ooba`s madness.
name: Kakinoki Jin
